title: Google Search will label ‘highly cited’ sources in the Top Stories carousel
content:
To help people evaluate news that appears in Search, Google is adding a “highly cited” label to the Top Stories carousel and other information literacy tips.

more…

The post Google Search will label ‘highly cited’ sources in the Top Stories carousel appeared first on 9to5Google.
